marketoEmbeddedForm.marketoFormLeadSourceDetail: [BETA] Q2'22 WEB - GBL - Self-Serve Partner Program Closed Beta

relatedBlades.copy: ![Working Graphic Self Serve Partner Program](//cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/2jaTBeldR9chDAR5C4aJ5h/f3e2d6e619cd243ab62810fd3127503a/Group_4182__1_.png) The Self-Serve Agency Program allows SMB agencies & hosting partners to manage your clients self-serve accounts easier. - Multi-tenant dashboard - Centralized billing - Discounted plans - No revenue commitments Important notes: Cloudflare customers with active accounts must create a NEW USER to apply for the agency program. If accepted, domain and account migration to your new agency account must be handled manually by your team. __This program is currently in open beta and designed as a self-serve experience__. Our Agency Partners who find success in this program fit the following criteria: - Manage their end clients' accounts as superadmins - Use only one billing profile for all accounts - Not currently residing in the APJC region For questions, please reach out to agency@cloudflare.com.
relatedBlades.rightSideCopy: Please see our Cloudflare Agency Terms. When applying, we recommend creating a new Cloudflare user (e.g. cloudflare@xyz.com) and set up a new billing profile for that user. Only domains added to your Agency Tenant Account will be considered for the program discount.

relatedBlades.title: Without guardrails, AI bots can freely crawl and use your client's website content. Cloudflare AI Audit lets web owners identify which bots are crawling their site and block them with a single click.

relatedBlades.sectionTitle: What are the benefits of the Agency Program?
relatedBlades.copy1: Manage accounts for each of your customers under one central dashboard and provide discreet access controls.
relatedBlades.copy2: Partner-managed billing allows all of your accounts to flow up to a single billing profile.
relatedBlades.copy3: Unlike our Enterprise program, our agency path requires no upfront commitments and includes volume discounts on all self-serve customer spend.

relatedBlades.copy:
__Q: When can I expect to hear back about my application?__
Applications are reviewed every 2-3 weeks. Please expect a wait time of up to 4 weeks before your application is fully processed. You will only receive an email notification if you are accepted. __Q: What payment methods are available for the Agency Partner Program?__
Only Credit Cards are accepted as valid payment methods for the program at this time. __Q: What Cloudflare products are available for Agency Partners?__
Agency Partners have access to all self-serve products and add-ons. These are any product that can be purchased for a standard account without a contract. __Q: Is there a fee or other requirement?__
There are no fees or revenue requirements during the beta phase of this program at this time. __Q: What products receive the partner discount?__
All self-serve products with the exception of Cloudflare Registrar. __Q: What support can I expect as an Agency Partner?__
You can expect our team to assist you with tenant access and any questions/issues around your agency partnership. Any questions regarding Cloudflare products or solutions should be addressed by creating a ticket for the Cloudflare Customer Support Team: https://dash.cloudflare.com/?to=/:account/support __Q: Where can I find my API Key?__
The Global API key is the one that is given Tenant permissions for the program. It can be found via the dashboard - [https://dash.cloudflare.com/profile/api-tokens](https://dash.cloudflare.com/profile/api-tokens) __Q: Can customers see the partner discount?__
The discount is only seen in the invoice to the partner. Its not visible at checkout or in the dashboard. __Q: Does the discount only apply to child accounts under the parent account?__
The parent and child accounts will be eligible for the partner discount. __Q: Will we need to migrate current domains to the new accounts to receive the program benefits?__
Yes, it is recommended to re-create the zone under the new tenant and disable the old domain. More detail is available here: [https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/204615358-Moving-domains-between-Cloudflare-accounts ](https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/204615358-Moving-domains-between-Cloudflare-accounts) __Q: To confirm, with the Tenant API parent account, you can drill down into accessing everything about the child account?__
Yes, but note that all agency tenant superadmins will still need to be added as a superadmin to all child accounts as well. Implicit Access is coming soon. __Q: Where can I see the invoices?__
Invoices are visible in the parent user's billing profile. Child Accounts will always see "Managed by Partner" in their billing profile. __Q: Can I provide the customer a Super Admin role or will the Tenant Admin always be placed as the SuperAdmin of the account?__
The Tenant Admin will always be Super Admin today for self-serve accounts. __Q: As a beta, could this go away?__
The final offering and details of this program are subject to change as this program develops through its beta. However, Cloudflare has grown this project team with active benchmarking throughout the beta with a strong commitment to our partners. Apply Now! Terms and Conditions: [http://cloudflare.com/agency-terms](http://cloudflare.com/agency-terms "Agency Program Terms")
